responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "6C9276B94744A763945FF4908453CCFF", "A worthy pursuit. A bow requires patience, precision, and an understanding of the wood\'s spirit. We will begin with a simple hunting bow. It will teach you about selecting the wood, shaping the limbs, and stringing it true. Find some cord and wooden staves and fashion a wooden bow. Focus on balance and smooth lines. Show me when it\'s complete.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Artisan_Dunir_ElaraShaggybrows_5_Response
